div.p: Our mission is to empower students to think critically and become productive, global citizens through innovative learning, collaborative communication and responsive citizenship.

Innovative learning.
Collaborative communication.
Responsive citizenship.

Lemont-Bromberek CSD 113A Educator Nominated for National LifeChanger of the Year Award

div.p: Lemont-Bromberek Combined School District 113A is an Early Childhood to Eighth Grade School District located in Lemont, Illinois. We are proud of our heritage and academic excellence. We are committed to providing our students with a world-class education and serving our community.
